sentences.en: He is trying to project a more dignified, statesmanlike image in this election year.
sentences.cn: 他正试图在这个选举年中树立一种更加威严、更有政治家风范的形象。

sentences.en: He was widely respected as a wise and statesmanlike governor.
sentences.cn: 他作为一位睿智、具备政治家才干的州长而广受尊崇。

sentences.en: his statesmanlike handling of the crisis
sentences.cn: 他处理这场危机时表现出的政治家才干

sentences.en: Used when a politician needs to appear statesmanlike and non - partisan.
sentences.cn: 政治家想要显得特别重要、特别有风度的时候酷爱此词.
